title: Citi Introduces Sinosure Debut Transaction in Middle East North Africa Region
summary: Citi Pakistan and Hong Kong successfully executed the first-ever Sinosure (Chinese ECA) backed term trade financing transaction for Citi in the Middle East and Pakistan region. The transaction covers the supply of telecommunication equipment from Huawei Hong Kong to Pakistan Mobile Communications Limited (Vimpelcom subsidiary), the largest cellular operating company in Pakistan. The deal size for the transaction is $25 million.
tag-1: Citi Introduces Sinosure Debut Transaction in Middle East North Africa Region
tag-2: Citi Pakistan and Hong Kong successfully executed the first-ever Sinosure (Chinese ECA) backed term trade financing transaction for Citi in the Middle East and Pakistan region. The transaction covers the supply of telecommunication equipment from Huawei Hong Kong to Pakistan Mobile Communications Limited (Vimpelcom subsidiary), the largest cellular operating company in Pakistan. The deal size for the transaction is $25 million.
tag-3: Citi Pakistan's Head of Global Banking Yousaf Ahmad said, "This transaction brings Huawei closer to Citi in the region, as Citi has been instrumental in facilitating receivable financing for Huawei with the major telecom operators in Pakistan, paving the way for an expansive relationship with Huawei in the Middle East & Pakistan region."
tag-4: Arif Usmani, CCO Pakistan, stated, "Citi Pakistan is proud to have executed this transaction in partnership with the Citi Hong Kong team. This transaction reiterates our commitment to providing value-added solutions to our clients and is particularly significant, given the need to introduce innovative financial solutions and investment opportunities to Pakistan at this challenging juncture."
tag-5: Citi continues to use its state-of-the-art technology platform and vast global footprint to introduce innovative products and services to Pakistan's financial services sector. This deal comes on the heels of a recent partnership which Citi Pakistan has signed with the Government of Pakistan, marking the government's return to international capital markets after four years.
tag-6: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
